99050.「ありがとうございました！\n モンスターバトルロードは いつでも\n ご来場を:
Thank you very much! Monster Battle Road will
always be here for you!

99051.「あらっ 残念ですわ。\n 気が変わったら いつでも お越しくださいね！\n<e:
Oh, that's too bad... If you change your
mind, you're always welcome to come back!<end>

99052.「ようこそ モンスターバトルロードへ！\n 何を なさいますか？\n<break:
Welcome to Monster Battle Road! What can I do
for you?<break>

99053.「かしこまりました！ では ええと……\n <pc>様は はじめてのご出場ですの:
Understood! Well, um...since you're just starting out, you'll start at G Rank.
Battle Road uses a rank-based system to determine the strength of its contestants.
As you win matches, you'll accrue Battle Road Points, which you'll need in order to rank up.
Once you earn enough points, you'll be able to take a test to increase your rank!
However, there is a limit to how many times you can participate. To start, you'll get 30 tries. After that, you'll get 1 per day.
Now then, let's get started!

99054.「ようこそ モンスターバトルロードへ！\n<br>\n「バトルロードとは 仲間モ:
Welcome to Monster Battle Road!
Battle Road is a tradition here in Al-Ahagiro where you compete with your fellow monsters and fight for glory!
You can participate in these battles with three of your own fellow monsters and one support monster!
Winners will not only receive fabulous prizes, but know the highest honor of deeply bonding with their fellow monsters!
Well? What do you say? Wouldn't you like to register for Battle Road?

99813.「それでは 仲間に加える モンスター\n １匹を お選びくださいませ！\n<br:
Now, please choose a monster to join our
ranks!<break>

99854.「バトルをスタートして よろしいですか？\n<yesno><break>: May I begin the battle, sir?<yesno><break>

100171.「それでは参加される試合の\n ランクを お選びくださいませ！\n<break>:
Please select the rank of the match you wish
to participate in.<break>

100174.「対戦パーティを お選びください！\n 名前に 色が付いているものがあれば\n:
Please select the party you'd like to face!
A colored name indicates that your opponent
will be quite strong.
<end>

100180.「『<%sL_ENEMY>』との対戦で\n よろしいですか？\n<yesno><:
You'd like to do battle with
<%sL_ENEMY>?<yesno><break>

100191.「ようこそ モンスターバトルロードへ！\n<br>\n「バトルロードとは 仲間モ:
Welcome to the Monster Battle Roads! The Battle Roads are a traditional competition in the Kingdom of Alajaghiro, where fellow
monsters compete for strength and pride! In order to compete in the Battle Road, you must have three companion monsters. It seems you
don't have any... When you have more than three monsters, please come back... We're always waiting for you to join us!

100192.「仲間モンスターを ３匹 お選びください。\n １番目に選んだ リーダーモンスタ:
Please choose three fellow monsters. Please
note that you will only control the leader
monster during battles.

101207.「どの 仲間モンスターを\n パーティに くわえますか？\n<break>:
Which of these monsters would you like to add
to your party?<break>

101612.「パーティの準備で ございますね！\n 何を なさいますか？\n<break>:
What can I do for you in regards to preparing
your party?
<break>

101613.「あらっ？ パーティの作成の途中ですが\n この状態を 破棄して\n 終了して:
What? I'm in the middle of creating a party,
but would you mind if I abandoned this state
and terminated it?<yesno 2><break>

101615.「それでは こちらのパーティを\n バトルロード出場メンバーとして\n 登録して:
You'd like me to register this party for
participation in Battle Road?
<yesno><break>

101616.「つよさの確認で ございますね！\n どのモンスターの つよさを確認されますか？:
I see you're checking strength! Which
monster's strength do you want to check?<break>

101617.「こちらで登録した サポートモンスターは\n 他の出場者のバトルに\n ４匹目の:
The support monster you registered here will
join another contestant's battle as the
fourth party member...<break>

101618.「サポートモンスターの設定を行います。\n 何を なさいますか？\n<break:
You'd like to set up your support monster?
Which can I help you with?
<break>

101619.「どの 仲間モンスターを登録しますか？\n<break>:
Which fellow monsters do you want to
register?<break>

101620.「あら？ <%sL_MONSTER>様は\n すでに サポートモンスターとして\:
Oh? It seems that <%sL_MONSTER> has already
been registered as a support monster...<bw_break>

101621.「かしこまりました！ それでは\n <%sL_MONSTER>様を サポートモン:
Yes, sir! I'd like to register <%sL_MONSTER>
as a Support Monster... Are you sure?<yesno><break>

101622.「ただいま <%sL_MONSTER_2>様を登録中です。\n <%sL_MON:
You have just registered <%sL_MONSTER_2>...
Do you want to cancel <%sL_MONSTER_2> and
register <%sL_MONSTER>?<yesno><break>

101827.「バトルロードに参加するには まず\n 『パーティの準備』で 仲間モンスターたち:
In order to participate in the Battle Road, you must first register a party of fellow monsters in the "Prepare Party" section...
Please go to "Prepare Your Party" first...

101828.「ようこそ モンスターバトルロードへ！\n<br>\n「バトルロードとは 仲間モ:
Welcome to the Monster Battle Road!
Battle Road is the pride of Al-Ahagiro, where fellow monsters compete for strength and glory!
...but it looks like you're in a party at the moment.
My apologies, but you can't enter Battle Road while in a party.
If you'd like to participate, please come back while you aren't in a party with others.

101830.「あらっ？ そちらの装備品は\n すでに 登録されているみたいですわ。:
Hm? It seems that equipment is already
registered.

101831.「これ以上 装備品を登録することは\n できませんわ。登録済みの 装備品を解除し:
You can't register any more equipment. You'll
have to deregister some of your other
equipment and make some room.

101835.「<pc>様の <%sL_MONSTER>様が\n サポートモンスターとして活躍:
Your <%sL_MONSTER> has been very
helpful as a support monster! Please take
these Battle Road Coins as a reward!

101836.「それでは これまで <%sL_MONSTER>様が\n サポートモンスターとし:
I will reward you with the contributions
<%sL_MONSTER> has made as a support
monster!

101837.「ここでは サポートモンスターを\n お貸しする 他の出場者の方に向けた\n コ:
This is where you can set up comments for the
other contestants who will be lending you
their support monsters!<break>

101838.「こちらのコメントで よろしいでしょうか？\n<yesno><break>: Are you sure you want to comment here?<yesno><break>

101839.「現在登録中の <%sL_MONSTER>様を\n サポートモンスター登録から:
I'd like to remove <%sL_MONSTER> from your
support monster list, if that's okay.<yesno 2><break>

101840.「<%sL_MONSTER>様の\n サポートモンスターの登録を\n 解除いたし:
I've unregistered <%sL_MONSTER> as a support
monster...<bw_break>

101842.「<%sL_MONSTER>様の設定を\n 完了して よろしいですか？\n<ye:
Are you sure you want to complete the
configuration for <%sL_MONSTER>?<yesno><break>

101843.「まあっ <pc>様\n お待ちしておりました！\n<br>\n「ついに <pc:
Oh my! I've been waiting to see you, !
You've finally earned enough Battle Road Points to take your rank up test!
When you think you're ready, speak to Hammer over there. Best of luck to you!
And of course, you can continue to participate in Battle Road as you normally have.

101844.「……あらっ？ どうぐかばんが いっぱいで\n 報酬が 受け取れないので\n そ:
...Huh? Your item bag is full and you won't
be able to receive a reward, so you can't
choose a party to battle against.
<end>

101864.「こちらは 新品の装備品でございますね。\n 登録すると 他の人に 渡せなくなり:
This is a brand-new piece of equipment... If
I register it, I won't be able to give it to
anyone else, if that's okay.<yesno 2><close>

101973.「サポートモンスターとは\n ４匹目のパーティメンバーとして参加する\n 他の出:
A Support Monster is the fourth party member of another contestant's companion monster! Anyone who reaches F rank or higher can
register their own companion monster as a Support Monster... And if that Support Monster performs well in another contestant's
Battle Road, you'll be rewarded with Battle Road Coins... It's a great chance to earn Battle Coins with your favorite monsters, so
be sure to register them under "Support Monsters"! That's right! You can also set up your equipment, badges, and other settings
specifically for use as a Support Monster... In other words, you can register new settings that are different from your usual Battle
Road settings, so please try customizing them in various ways!

102444.「あらっ！ 残念ですが\n <pc>様は すでに バトル参加権を\n 使い切って:
Oh, my! I'm sorry. It looks like you've already used up all your battle credits... Your battle entry will be charged once a day, so please come back
tomorrow...

102679.「パーティを作成するには\n 仲間モンスター３匹の登録が 必要です。\n 仲間モ:
To create a party, you need to register three
companion monsters... Please select three
companion monsters...<end>

102886.「他に ご用は ありますか？\n<break>: Is there anything else I can do for you?<break>

102919.「サポートモンスターとは\n 他の出場者の 助っ人として試合に参加する\n 仲間:
A support monster is a monster that other players can use to assist them in their matches.
If you are at F Rank or higher, you'll be able to register support monsters. Be sure to try and rank up!

102920.「あらっ？ サポートモンスターとして登録する\n モンスターを 選択していないよ:
What? You haven't selected a monster to add
as a support monster... Please select a
monster...<bw_break>

103154.<%sL_MONSTER>が 装備していた\nバッジが はずれました。:
The badge that <%sL_MONSTER> was
wearing has been removed.

103155.「試合規定により 同じ種類のモンスターを\n ２匹以上パーティに入れることは で:
The rules state that a party cannot have more
than one of the same monster. Please choose
a different monster.
<end>

103157.<%sL_MONSTER> が装備していた\n装備品が はずれました。:
The equipment <%sL_MONSTER> was
wearing has been removed.

103399.「モンスターバトルロードとは 仲間モンスターの\n 強さを競って戦う 伝統ある競:
Monster Battle Road is a traditional competition where you fight for the strength of your fellow monsters! You can't use any
tools... In Battle Roads, there's a rank system based on the strength of the contestants. The higher your rank, the
stronger your opponents, and the more expensive your prizes! To move up in rank, you need to accumulate Battle Road Points,
which you can earn by winning matches... You'll be given the right to challenge the rank-up test... If you win a battle, you also
get Battle Road Coins, which you can exchange for prizes at the prize exchange next door. But there is a limit to the number of times
you can participate... You'll be given 30 battle entries to begin with, and after that, you'll be charged one entry per day. You can
accumulate up to 300 battle entries.

103403.「何について ご説明いたしますか？\n<break>: What would you like me to explain?<break>

103408.「あらっ？ <pc>様は\n バッジを お持ちではないようですわ。\n<bw_b: What?<pc> You don't seem to have a badge...<bw_break>

103409.「それでは いよいよ 試合が始まります！\n 準備が できましたら 『バトルスタ:
Now it's time for the match to begin! Please
select "Battle Start" when you're ready!<break>

103410.「それでは いよいよ 試合が始まります！\n 準備が できましたら 『バトルスタ:
Now it's time for the match to begin! Please
select "Battle Start" when you're ready!<break>

103411.「入れ替えたモンスターは 装備品と\n バッジが はずれてしまいますが\n よろ:
If you replace the monster, its equipment and
badge will be removed.<yesno 2><break>

103413.「バトルロードに出場する パーティに入れる\n 仲間モンスターを ３匹 お選びく:
You may choose three companion monsters to join your party in the Battle Road... You may only give orders to your first chosen leader
monster during the match...

103414.「対戦パーティを お選びください！\n 名前に 色が付いているものがあれば\n:
Please select the party you'd like to face!
A colored name indicates that your opponent
will be quite strong.
<end>

103417.「『そうび変更・登録』を ご利用いただくには\n まず パーティを作成する必要が:
You must create a party before you can use
"Modify and Register". Please select "Create
a Party"...<bw_break>

103418.「バトルロードに エントリーするには\n まず最初に パーティの作成が必要ですわ:
To enter the Battle Roads, you must first
create a party... Please select "Prepare
Party"...<end>

103419.「バトルロードポイントが 条件をみたしたので\n ランクアップ試験に ご挑戦いた:
You've earned enough Battle Road Points to
take the rank up test! Go and speak with
Instructor Hammer to get started.
<bw_break>

103420.「サポートモンスターとは\n 他の出場者の 助っ人として試合に参加する\n 仲間:
A support monster is a monster that other players can use to assist them in their matches.
If you are at F Rank or higher, you'll be able to register support monsters. Be sure to try and rank up!

103426.「さくせんの変更は パーティを作成してから\n ご利用になれますわ。まずは\n:
You can make changes to your operation after
you create a party. Please select "Create
Party" first...<bw_break>

103427.「パーティメンバーの さくせんを\n 設定してくださいませ。リーダーモンスターは:
Please set the tactics you'd like your party
members to use. The leader monster cannot
have its tactics set as you will control them.
<break>

103428.「使用するとくぎを 設定してくださいませ。\n リーダーモンスターは 命令ができ:
Please set the skills you'd like to be used.
Please note that the leader monster's settings
won't be applied since you can control them.

103429.「登録したパーティが バトルで使用する特技と\n さくせんを ご変更いただけます:
I'd like to change the specialties and
strategies that my party will use in battle.
How may I help you?<break>

103430.「バトルロードに出場するパーティが使う\n 装備品について 変更できます！\n:
You can change the equipment your party uses
to compete in the Battle Roads! What would
you like to use?<break>

103431.「ここでは バトルロードに出場する\n パーティの作成や そうびの変更ができます:
This is where you can create your own party
for the Battle Road and change your party's
behavior. First, select "Create a Party"...<break>

103432.「パーティを バッチリ作成できましたか？\n パーティの作成が できましたら 次:
Have you successfully created your party? Once you've created your party, I'd recommend you to go to the next step, which is to
modify and register it.

103434.「あらっ？ 設定をおやめになるのですね。\n 変更内容は 保存されませんが\n:
What? If you'd like to stop the
configuration... Your changes will not be
saved, if that's all right with you.<yesno 2><break>

103436.「サポートモンスターの 設定をします！\n まずは『モンスター選択』に お進みに:
Let's set up a support monster! First, go to
"Select Monster" and choose a monster to
register...<break>

103437.「サポートモンスターの設定を行います。\n 何を なさいますか？\n<bw_br:
You'd like to set up your support monster?
Which can I help you with?
<bw_break>

103438.「他の出場者の試合で サポートモンスターが使う\n とくぎを 設定してくださいま:
Please set up a special move for the support
monster to use in the other contestants'
matches...<break>

103439.「サポートモンスターですね！\n こちらについては 少々説明が ございますの。\:
It's a support monster! There's a few things I need to explain about these... A Support Monster is, as you know, a fourth party
member who helps out in other contestants' matches... If your registered Support Monster performs well in another contestant's match,
you'll receive Battle Road Coins! In addition, you can set up your equipment and other information specifically for your
support monster... In other words, you'll be able to set up different settings than the ones you normally use to compete in Battle
Roads, so be sure to customize your settings! Now! Now, please select "Register Monster"...

103440.「バトルには 作成したパーティメンバーに加え\n 他の出場者が あずけているモン:
In addition to your party members, you will be joined in battle by one of the other contestants' support monsters, also known as
"support monsters. What race do you want your support monster to be?

103745.「申し訳ないのですが 試合規則により\n 同じ種類のモンスターを パーティに\n:
I apologize, but the rules state that you
cannot have more than one of the same type
of monster in your party.
<end>

103764.「他に 何か ご説明いたしますか？\n<break>: Is there anything else I can tell you?<break>

103766.「こちらでは 仲間モンスターが装備する\n バッジの変更や 収集したバッジを\n:
This is where you can change the badges your fellow monsters wear and see which ones you've collected. How would you like to do
that?

103767.「パーティの装備を 変更するためには\n まず 装備品の登録が 必要ですの。\n:
In order to change your party's equipment,
you must first register it. Please select
"Register Equipment"...<bw_break>

103768.「そうびについて 設定されるには\n まず モンスターの選択が必要ですの。\n:
If you'd like to set equipment, you'll need to
first select a monster.
<bw_break>

103769.「バッジについて 設定されるには\n まず モンスターの選択が必要ですの。\n:
To set up your badge, you must first select a
monster... Please select a monster first...<bw_break>

103770.「使用とくぎについて 設定されるには\n まず モンスターの選択が必要ですの。\:
The first thing you need to do is select a
monster... Please select a monster first...<bw_break>

103771.「ひとことコメントについて 設定されるには\n まず モンスターの選択が必要です:
If you'd like to set a comment, you'll need to
first select a monster.
<bw_break>

103809.「まあっ <pc>様！\n Ｆランクへの昇格 おめでとうございます！\n<br>:
My my, ! Congratulations on reaching F Rank!
Those who reach F Rank or higher will be able to register their monsters as support monsters.
You'll earn coins while your monster is registered, so be sure to give it a try!

103810.「バトルロードに参加させる\n 仲間モンスターを ３匹 お選びください。\n<b:
Please choose three of your monsters that
you'd like to participate.
<break>

103811.「他に 何か準備することは ございますか？\n<break>:
Is there anything else you need?
<break>

103859.「<%sL_MONSTER>ですね。\n すでに パーティに参加されているので\:
<%sL_MONSTER>... Since you've already joined
the party, I'm going to have to change the
order.<yesno><break>

103887.「あら… すでに ご登録から消えている\n 装備品があったようですわ。\n 装備:
Oh... It appears that some of your equipment has already been removed from your inventory. Please be aware that you are no longer
equipped...

103889.「バッチリ 装備できましたか？\n バトルに入る準備が終わりましたら 戻って\n:
You're all set? When you're ready to enter
the battle, go back and select "Battle
Entry"...<break>

103899.「ここで説明するバッジとは バトルロードで\n 勝ち上がっていくためには 必需品:
Allow me to explain Badges to you. They're quite essential to advancing through Battle Road, you know! And Battle Road is the only
place you can use them!
When equipped to your fellow monsters, their attributes will increase or they may even learn new skills.
There's even rare Badges that let them use Special skills!
Just let me know whenever you want to equip your monsters with Badges!
As for how to get Badges...you'll sometimes get them as a reward for participating in Battle Road!
Also, if you manage to collect Battle Road Coins, you'll be able to exchange them for Badges.
Oh, and have you seen King Moo...ah, I mean! Have you seen Grandpa Badge? He's usually hanging out around here.
I heard he'll exchange his Badges for your unwanted ones, so I'd go try talking to him when you get a chance.

104057.「あらっ？ <%sL_MONSTER>は\n すでに リーダーモンスターに\n:
Hm? It looks like <%sL_MONSTER>
is already designated as the leader.
<break>

104059.「<%sL_MONSTER>様を リーダーモンスターに\n 変更してよろしいです:
You would like <%sL_MONSTER> to
be the leader monster instead?
<yesno><break>

105621.「あら？ <pc>様は 登録できる\n 装備品を お持ちではないようですわ。\n:
What's this? You don't have any equipment that
can be registered.
<end>

105622.「あらっ？ <pc>様は ただ今\n 登録されている装備品が ないようですね。\:
What? It appears that you do not have any equipment registered with us at this time. In order to use Sobi, you must first register your
equipment in the Sobi Product Registration section.

112607.「ようこそ モンスターバトルロードへ！\n<br>\n「このたび モンスターバト:
Welcome to Monster Battle Road! We've opened up the rank-up test to A-rank on Monster Battle Road! A-rank is a stage for even the
most selective of Monster Masters! I'm looking forward to your challenges! And now, without further ado...

112838.「……申し訳ありません。<%sL_MONSTER>様は\n ただ今 ご都合が 悪:
Sorry, but <%sL_MONSTER> is not

another monster.
<bw_break>

<yesno><break>

114908.バトルロード参加権が <%dL_SANKAKEN>回 増えた！<se_nots:

<se_nots System 7><bw_break>

114945.「かしこまりましたわ。\n それでは 改めて……。\n<bw_break>:
Understood. Let's start from the

114946.「交換が 完了しましたわ。\n それでは 改めて……。\n<bw_break>:
The exchange is complete. Now then,
once more...
<bw_break>

115912.「つよさの確認は パーティを作成してから\n ご利用になれますわ。まずは\n 『:
You'll need to create a party before you can
check "Stats". You can do so by selecting
"Create Party".
<bw_break>

119329.「あら… コインの上限を超えてしまいますわね。\n コインを受け取れる状態にして:
Oh...looks like you can't hold any more coins.
Come back when you got some room.
<bw_break>

119351.「あら…… <%sL_MONSTER>様が\n サポートモンスターとして 活躍さ:
Oh...? Looks like there's a reward waiting for <%sL_MONSTER>'s efforts as a support monster, but...
That reward will make you exceed your coin limit. Go spend some coins first and then come back.

166245.「ようこそ モンスターバトルロードへ！\n<br>\n「<pc>さん お待ちして:
Welcome to Monster Battle Road! We're waiting for you... A new feature has been added for all Mage users of B rank and above... You'll be able to participate in
battles where you can earn 10 times the amount of Coins and BP by using your Participation Points 10 times at once! This
is your chance to get more rewards for winning battles... I hope you'll make the most of it! That's all for now... And now,
once again...

166246.「ようこそ モンスターバトルロードへ！\n<br>\n「このたび モンスターバト:
Welcome to Monster Battle Road! I'm pleased to announce that Monster Battle Road has released a rank-up test to S rank! S-rank is
the highest honor... It's the highest honor given to those who fight the strongest magic users and are recognized! The test will be
tougher than ever. Please prepare carefully... And now, once again...

168295.「１０倍バトルエントリーは\n Ｂランク以上の バトルだけになりますわ。:
10x battle entry is only available for
battles of rank B and above...

168296.「申し訳ありません。\n そちらは Ｂランク以上で\n 出場できる バトルになり:
I'm sorry... You must have a rank of "B" or
higher to compete in this battle...

168301.「申し訳ありません。\n 参加権が 足らないようですわ。:
I'm sorry. I'm afraid we don't have enough
tickets...

173526.「１０倍バトルは Ｂランク以上のバトルで\n コインや ＢＰが １０倍入手でき\:
10x Battles are for B-rank battles and above.
You can get 10x the coins and BP, and the
rewards are even better!<break>

271366.「サポートモンスターの 種族は\n どうなさいますか？\n<break>:
What should I do about the race of the
support monster?<break>

271370.「……申し訳ありません。そのモンスターは\n 誰も あずけていないようですわ。\:
... I'm sorry... I don't think anyone else
has that monster. You'll have to choose
another species...<bw_break>

279066.「スキルポイントが ふりわけられていない\n 仲間モンスターが パーティにいます:
There's a fellow monster in my party who
hasn't been assigned any skill points. Are
you sure you want to enter?<yesno2><break>

279067.「<%sL_MONSTER>様は\n スキルポイントが ふりわけられていませんが:
<%sL_MONSTER>-sama has no skill points
assigned, can I still register him?<yesno2><break>

296045.「ただいま １０周年をお祝いして\n バトルロードフィーバー開催中です！\n<b:
We are currently celebrating our 10th anniversary with Battle Road Fever! During this period, we are giving away an additional
10 Battle Road participation rights every day. Please take it.

296046.「……あらっ？ バトルロード参加権が\n 上限を超えてしまうようですね。\n お:
...Oh my? It seems that the maximum number of Battle Road participation rights has been exceeded. The participation rights we can give
you will be limited to the upper limit.

296047.「また バトルの勝利で 得られる報酬も\n 普段より 多めになっております。\n:
Also, you can get more rewards for winning battles than usual. For example...Battle Road points and coins will be increased by 1.5
times! The probability of obtaining a silver badge or higher will be doubled! Please take this opportunity to give it a try. Now then,
once again...

297200.「ただいま バトルロードフィーバー開催中です！\n 期間は <tm%nPERIO: Battle Road Fever is now underway! The period is monthdaytominute OD_END>! Sir?

298505.バトルロード参加権が <%dL_SANKAKEN>回 増えた！\n合計で <%d:
Battle Road participation rights increased
<%dL_SANKAKEN> times! The total is now
<%dL_SANKAKEN_3> times!
<se_nots System 7><bw_break>

310401.「つよさについて 確認するには\n まず モンスターの選択が必要ですの。\n 先:
To check the stats of a monster, you must
first select a monster. Please choose "Select
Monster" first.<bw_break>

321313.「ようこそ モンスターバトルロードへ！\n<br>\n「バトルロードとは 仲間モ:
Welcome to Monster Battle Road!
Battle Road is a tradition here in Al-Ahagiro where you compete with your fellow monsters and fight for glory!
You can participate in these battles with three of your own fellow monsters and one support monster!
Winners will not only receive fabulous prizes, but know the highest honor of deeply bonding with their fellow monsters!
Well? What do you say? Wouldn't you like to register for Battle Road?

321314.「かしこまりました！ では ええと……\n <pc>様は はじめてのご出場ですの:
Understood! Well, um...since you're just starting out, you'll start at G Rank.
Battle Road uses a rank-based system to determine the strength of its contestants.
As you win matches, you'll accrue Battle Road Points, which you'll need in order to rank up.
Once you earn enough points, you'll be able to take a test to increase your rank!
However, there is a limit to how many times you can participate. To start, you'll get 30 tries. After that, you'll get 1 per day.
Now then, let's get started!

321315.「あらっ 残念ですわ。\n 気が変わったら いつでも お越しくださいね！\n<e:
Oh, that's too bad... If you change your
mind, you're always welcome to come back!<end>

321316.「ようこそ モンスターバトルロードへ！\n<br>\n「このたび モンスターバト:
Welcome to Monster Battle Road! We've opened up the rank-up test to A-rank on Monster Battle Road! A-rank is a stage for even the
most selective of Monster Masters! I'm looking forward to your challenges! And now, without further ado...

321317.「モンスターバトルロード・アナザーへ\n よく来たな！ 何をしたいんだ？\n<b:
Welcome to Monster Battle Road: Another!
What can I do for ya?
<break>

321322.「また来てくれよな！\n モンスターバトルロード・アナザーは\n いつでも 挑戦: Do come again! I'll be waiting!

321326.「対戦パーティを 選んでくれ！\n 名前に 色が付いているものは\n 手強い相手:
Go ahead and pick your opponent!
Careful, though...if their name's in color,
they won't be easy to beat!
<end>

321327.「対戦パーティを 選んでくれ！\n 名前に 色が付いているものは\n 手強い相手:

<end>

<yesno><break>

for the Battle Road and change your party's
behavior. First, select "Create a Party"...<break>

321383.「サポートモンスターとは\n 他の出場者の 助っ人として試合に参加する\n 仲間:
A support monster is a monster that other players can use to assist them in their matches.
If you are at F Rank or higher, you'll be able to register support monsters. Be sure to try and rank up!
